title: Better buses for Casey
articleContent:
Better buses for Casey

Bus Route 863 will not service selected bus stops from Sunday 25 June 2023 until further notice.

Bus stops that will not be serviced:

  • Bushman Way/Evans Road (to Cranbourne West) – passengers may use the stop at Andretti Avenue/Evans Road
  • Breens Road/Evans Road (to Endeavour Hills) – passengers may use the stop at Fairhaven Boulevard/Evans Road
  • Central Park Way/Evans Road (to Cranbourne West) – passengers may use the stop at Fairhaven Boulevard/Evans Road
  • Montrose Way/Evans Road (to Cranbourne West) – passengers may use the stop at Duff Street/Evans Road

What’s changing on Route 863 Endeavour Hills SC – Cranbourne West via Hallam Road?

  • Route 863 will be extended south along Hallam Road and Evans Road to Cranbourne West Shopping Village.
  • The extension will provide residents along the route with better access to shops, schools and other transport services.
  • The extended route will also provide access to Cranbourne West Secondary College for students who live in Cranbourne West, Hampton Park and Lyndhurst.
  • Route 863 services will continue to be coordinated with trains at Hallam Station.

What’s changing on Route 895 Narre Warren South – Fountain Gate SC via Narre Warren Station?

  • Route 895 will be re-routed to provide direct access to businesses along Victor Crescent in Narre Warren.
  • Currently, Route 895 travels from Narre Warren Station along Webb Street and Overland Drive to Fountain Gate Shopping.
  • Route 895 will be re-routed, traveling from Narre Warren Station, along Webb Street, Princess Highway, Victor Crescent, and Overland Drive to Fountain Gate Shopping Centre.
  • Residents along the route will still have access to shopping, schools, and other transport services.
  • A number of Route 895 short trips will be extended to stop at all bus stops along the route.
  • Route 895 services will continue to be coordinated with trains at Narre Warren Station. 

Passengers should check their timetable before they travel.

To plan your journey, view the new timetable for Route 863 and Route 895, visit Journey planner, or call 1800 800 007 to order a printed copy of your timetable.
articleDescription: From Sunday 26 June 2023, improvements will be introduced on bus routes 863 and 895 in the City of Casey.
